capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: The role requires achieving project outcomes and supporting organizational objectives through efficient use of resources and commitment to quality outcomes.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: The role involves developing, implementing, and monitoring strategic and operational plans for complex programs.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Requires superior knowledge to develop practical solutions for the successful delivery of natural capital accounting programs.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for leading project teams and managing project outcomes, adhering to legislation and policy.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Involves leading multidisciplinary and geographically dispersed teams, engaging and motivating staff.

capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: Requires providing direction and achieving results through teams, communicating goals and priorities.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: The role supports, promotes, and champions change within the context of strategic Natural Capital Accounting projects.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Essential for leading teams, developing plans, and ensuring the success of complex programs.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Requires collaboration with project teams, stakeholders, and partners to deliver project outcomes.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Critical for planning, coordinating, and controlling project activities to deliver strategic Natural Capital Accounting projects.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.description: Developing and implementing strategic and operational plans for natural capital accounting programs.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Leading multidisciplinary and geographically dispersed teams to achieve project and organizational objectives.

skills.name: Change Management
skills.description: Supporting, promoting, and managing change within the context of strategic projects.

generalRole.title: Strategic Environmental Program Manager
generalRole.description: This role involves leading the development, delivery, monitoring, and evaluation of strategic environmental projects, specifically focusing on natural capital accounting, to support organizational objectives and environmentally sustainable outcomes.
